main event: A witness in Miamisburg, Ohio reported seeing a bright white light in the sky on August 21, 1966 around 2:15 AM.
interesting points: The object was brighter than the brightest star and was traveling towards the northeast.
The object was visible for about 2-3 minutes.
The witness described the object as a bright white light, and said it was consistent with a satellite sighting.
The sky was clear with a few clouds, and there was no moonlight.
The witness was unable to estimate the speed or distance of the object.
